item.title: A Mathematical Lens for Teaching Data Science
item.description: arXiv:2501.02126v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Using the National Academies report, {\em Data Science for Undergraduates: Opportunities and Options}, we connect data science curricula to the more familiar pedagogy used by many mathematical scientists. We use their list of ``data acumen" components to ground a discussion, which hopes to connect data science curricula to the more familiar pedagogy used by many mathematical scientists.
item.dc:creator: Johanna Hardin
